text: Ra Anumzamoka kagri kagi kagenkea nentahi'na, vahemo'ma tro osuga zama tro hu'nana kavukva zankura tusiza hu'na koro hue. Amama mani'nona kafumofo agu'afina ete ana kavukva zana eri kasefa huge'za, tagri knafima mani'naza vahe'mo'za keho. Krimpa ahe'zamo'ma esania knafina kaganera kanioraminka kasunku huranto.
